question.text: Which of the following statement is incorrect?

options.text: The spring wood is lighter in colour and exhibits low density wereas the autumn wood is darker and has higher density
The heart wood is more durable and resistant to the attack of the microorganisms and insects as compared to the sap wood
Enucleated condition is found in phloem parenchyma

solution.text: Phloem parenchyma is simple parenchyma cell that contains cytoplasm, vacuole, and nucleus. They are found in association with sieve tubes and companion cells. They have a thin cell wall and used in food storage and transport of food. Sieve elements are usually enucleated, although they are living cells, and are thus completely dependent upon the associated companion cells leading to the concept of the sieve element–companion cell complex (SE/CC)
